content.p: We are researchers working at the interface of clinical practice and public health. Our disciplines include: Our aim is to deliver research that improves health and wellbeing. This is by: We teach public health and epidemiology in undergraduate medicine and deliver postgraduate taught courses. We're proud to also have a thriving PhD programme. In addition, we deliver a range of short courses in: Registration of Complex Rare Diseases - Exemplars in Rheumatology (RECORDER) Contacts: Call 0115 823 0031 ext.30031 or please see our 'contact us' page for further details
